Package za.co.entelect.challenge.botutils.detector

Class ObstacleDetector

java.lang.Object
za.co.entelect.challenge.botutils.Detector
za.co.entelect.challenge.botutils.detector.ObstacleDetector
public class ObstacleDetector extends Detector
ObstacleDetector is a detector to detect nearby obstacles in a car's surrounding.

  • Field Summary

    • canSeeOnAllLanes

      public boolean canSeeOnAllLanes(ObstacleType type, boolean withAcceleration)
      Detects specific obstacle type on all reachable lanes with or without acceleration.
      Parameters:
      type - obstacle type to detect
      withAcceleration - acceleration usage
      Returns:
      true if this ObstacleDetector detects the specific obstacle on all reachable lanes
